item.description: Stone's Public House is a traditional New England/Irish pub...and more! It really does have some of the finest cuisine that the Metrowest has to offer. The Public House prides itself on a rich history of fine food and drink, friendly service, camaraderie and, perhaps, a whisper of spirits not to be found anywhere else (it is said to be haunted and has been featured in the show House Hunters)! Meet us there....you won't regret it!!!
item.name: Dinner Night Out: Stone's Public House
